|ram1_num = 32 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:02:6F |oui = 00:02:6F |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.6 |pwr_conn = Ethernet (PoE) |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = hg directional |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = EnGeniusXXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/29/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 655216006034 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B009X0RQXW |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9285; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ERA150-0.30 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The integrated panel antenna has a gain of 8dBi. This device appears to be only powerable via PoE (24V, 0.6A w/ EPE-1212 injector). ==Links of Interest== [http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ENS200_user_manual_101112%20v.1.0.pdf User Guide]
[http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ENS200_DS_101912.pdf Datasheet] [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32008-engenius-ens200-long-range-wireless-80211n-24ghz-outdoor-bridgeap-reviewed Reviewed on SmallNetBuilder] :EnGeniusXXXXXX default SSID, 00:02:6F OUI ==Pictures==
